zh-cn: 东突厥斯坦伊斯兰运动
东突厥斯坦民族革命阵线

location.zh-cn: 巴基斯坦北瓦济里斯坦、叙利亚伊德利卜、中国新疆、阿富汗
location.en: North Waziristan, Pakistan; Idlib, Syria; Xinjiang, China; Afghanistan

description.zh-cn: 一个活跃于中亚和叙利亚的维吾尔族伊斯兰主义武装组织，其目标是在整个突厥斯坦（包括中国新疆和中亚各国）建立一个独立的政教合一的伊斯兰国家。该组织被联合国、中国、英国、土耳其等多个国家和国际组织认定为恐怖组织。
description.en: A Uyghur Islamist armed group active in Central Asia and Syria, aiming to establish an independent, theocratic Islamic state in the entire Turkestan region (including Xinjiang, China and Central Asian countries). It is designated as a terrorist organization by the United Nations, China, the UK, Turkey, and other countries and international organizations.

description.zh-cn: 突厥斯坦伊斯兰党的创始人之一。
description.en: One of the founders of the Turkistan Islamic Party.

description.zh-cn: 突厥斯坦伊斯兰党的创始人之一。
description.en: One of the founders of the Turkistan Islamic Party.

description.zh-cn: 突厥斯坦伊斯兰党的重建者和前领导人，2003年被巴基斯坦军队击毙。
description.en: Re-founder and former leader of the Turkistan Islamic Party, killed by the Pakistani military in 2003.

description.zh-cn: 突厥斯坦伊斯兰党的重建者之一。
description.en: One of the re-founders of the Turkistan Islamic Party.

zh-cn: 阿卜杜勒·哈克·突厥斯坦尼

description.zh-cn: 突厥斯坦伊斯兰党的现任领导人，曾于2010年被美军导弹击伤。
description.en: The current leader of the Turkistan Islamic Party, who was reportedly wounded in a US missile strike in 2010.

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国。曾将“东伊运”列为恐怖组织，后于2020年将其除名。
description.en: The United States of America. Formerly designated ETIM as a terrorist organization, but removed it from the list in 2020.

description.zh-cn: 将突厥斯坦伊斯兰党视为主要的恐怖主义威胁之一。
description.en: Considers the Turkistan Islamic Party as one of its primary terrorist threats.

description.zh-cn: 突厥斯坦伊斯兰党的创始地之一，同时也是该组织的反对者，曾参与对其的打击行动。
description.en: One of the founding locations of the Turkistan Islamic Party, and also an opponent of the group, having participated in operations against it.

description.zh-cn: 联合国的核心机构之一，负责维护国际和平与安全。于2002年将“东伊运”列入恐怖组织名单。
description.en: One of the principal organs of the United Nations, responsible for maintaining international peace and security. It listed ETIM as a terrorist organization in 2002.

description.zh-cn: 一个国际伊斯兰恐怖主义组织，曾向“东伊运”提供资金和训练支持。
description.en: An international Islamic terrorist organization that provided funding and training support to ETIM.

description.zh-cn: 阿富汗的伊斯兰原教旨主义政治和军事组织。曾支持“东伊运”，并在其统治时期允许“东伊运”在其境内活动。
description.en: An Islamic fundamentalist political and military organization in Afghanistan. It previously supported ETIM and allowed the group to operate on its territory during its rule.

nodes.id: 1997年乌鲁木齐“2.25”公共汽车爆炸案

zh-cn: 1997年乌鲁木齐“2.25”公共汽车爆炸案
乌鲁木齐公共汽车爆炸案

description.zh-cn: 1997年发生在乌鲁木齐的一系列公共汽车爆炸案，由“东伊运”策划。
description.en: A series of bus bombings in Ürümqi in 1997, planned by ETIM.

description.zh-cn: 于2017年将“东伊运”列入恐怖主义名单。
description.en: Listed ETIM as a terrorist organization in 2017.

description.zh-cn: 负责英国移民、安全和法律与秩序的政府部门。于2016年7月将突厥斯坦伊斯兰党列入被禁恐怖组织名单。
description.en: The UK government department responsible for immigration, security, and law and order. It added the Turkistan Islamic Party to its list of proscribed terrorist organisations in July 2016.

description.zh-cn: 于2014年将“东伊运”列入恐怖主义组织名单。
description.en: Listed ETIM as a terrorist organization in 2014.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国公安部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公安部
en: Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管全国公安工作的组成部门。于2003年公布首批“东突”恐怖组织名单，其中包括“东伊运”。
description.en: The constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for public security work nationwide. In 2003, it announced the first list of 'East Turkestan' terrorist organizations, which included ETIM.

description.zh-cn: 自2011年起在叙利亚发生的持续武装冲突。突厥斯坦伊斯兰党叙利亚分支作为反对派武装参与其中。
description.en: An ongoing armed conflict in Syria since 2011. The Syrian branch of the Turkistan Islamic Party participates as a rebel faction.

description.zh-cn: 维吾尔族活动家，世界维吾尔代表大会前主席。她否认新疆存在东突厥斯坦伊斯兰运动组织。
description.en: Uyghur activist and former president of the World Uyghur Congress. She has denied the existence of the ETIM organization in Xinjiang.

description.zh-cn: 代表海外维吾尔族世俗东突独立势力的主要组织。与以“东伊运”为代表的伊斯兰化势力争夺话语权。
description.en: The main organization representing secular East Turkestan independence forces among Uyghurs abroad. It competes with Islamist forces like ETIM for narrative control.

description.zh-cn: 2024年12月，叙利亚反对派武装攻占大马士革，结束了阿萨德家族的长期统治。
description.en: In December 2024, Syrian opposition forces captured Damascus, ending the long-term rule of the Assad family.

nodes.id: 叙利亚突厥斯坦伊斯兰党

zh-cn: 叙利亚突厥斯坦伊斯兰党

description.zh-cn: 突厥斯坦伊斯兰党在叙利亚的分支，活跃于叙利亚内战，于2025年1月宣布解散并并入叙利亚国防部。
description.en: The Syrian branch of the Turkistan Islamic Party, active in the Syrian Civil War. It announced its dissolution and merger into the Syrian Ministry of Defense in January 2025.

description.zh-cn: 叙利亚过渡政府成立后组建的国防机构，吸收了包括叙利亚突厥斯坦伊斯兰党在内的多个前反对派武装派别。
description.en: The defense body formed after the establishment of the Syrian transitional government, which absorbed several former opposition armed factions, including the Turkistan Islamic Party in Syria.

description.zh-cn: 叙利亚内战期间由多个伊斯兰主义反政府武装组成的联盟，突厥斯坦伊斯兰党曾是其成员。
description.en: An alliance of several Islamist anti-government armed groups during the Syrian Civil War, of which the Turkistan Islamic Party was a member.

description.zh-cn: 买买提·托乎提与阿不都热·合曼于1993年在巴基斯坦共同创立了“东伊运”。
description.en: Maimaiti Tuohuti, along with Abudureheman, co-founded ETIM in Pakistan in 1993.

description.zh-cn: 阿不都热·合曼与买买提·托乎提于1993年在巴基斯坦共同创立了“东伊运”。
description.en: Abudureheman, along with Maimaiti Tuohuti, co-founded ETIM in Pakistan in 1993.

description.zh-cn: 艾山·买合苏木与阿不都卡德尔·亚甫泉于1997年再次发起组织，重建了该组织。
description.en: Hasan Mahsum, along with Abudukadir Yapuquan, re-established the organization in 1997.

description.zh-cn: 阿不都卡德尔·亚甫泉与艾山·买合苏木于1997年再次发起组织，重建了该组织。
description.en: Abudukadir Yapuquan, along with Hasan Mahsum, re-established the organization in 1997.

relationships.target: 1997年乌鲁木齐“2.25”公共汽车爆炸案

description.zh-cn: 突厥斯坦伊斯兰党策划了1997年乌鲁木齐公共汽车爆炸案。
description.en: The Turkistan Islamic Party planned the 1997 Ürümqi bus bombings.

description.zh-cn: 盖达组织向突厥斯坦伊斯兰党（东伊运）提供了资金和训练支持。
description.en: Al-Qaeda provided funding and training support to the Turkistan Islamic Party (ETIM).

description.zh-cn: 突厥斯坦伊斯兰党得到了塔利班的支持，并在塔利班统治阿富汗时期在其境内活动。
description.en: The Turkistan Islamic Party was supported by the Taliban and operated in its territory during the Taliban's rule in Afghanistan.

description.zh-cn: 联合国安理会将东突厥斯坦伊斯兰运动列为恐怖组织。
description.en: The United Nations Security Council listed the East Turkestan Islamic Movement as a terrorist organization.

description.zh-cn: 美国财政部于2002年将“东伊运”列为恐怖组织，并对其进行制裁。
description.en: The U.S. Department of the Treasury designated ETIM as a terrorist organization in 2002 and imposed sanctions on it.

description.zh-cn: 美国政府正式将“东伊运”从恐怖组织名单上除名，理由是无可信证据表明其继续存在。
description.en: The U.S. government formally removed ETIM from its list of terrorist organizations, citing a lack of credible evidence that the group continued to exist.

description.zh-cn: 突厥斯坦伊斯兰党领导人艾山·买合苏木被巴基斯坦军队击毙。
description.en: Turkistan Islamic Party leader Hasan Mahsum was killed by the Pakistani military.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国公安部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公安部将东突厥斯坦伊斯兰运动列入首批“东突”恐怖组织名单。
description.en: The Ministry of Public Security of the PRC included the East Turkestan Islamic Movement in its first list of 'East Turkestan' terrorist organizations.

description.zh-cn: 突厥斯坦伊斯兰党领导人买买提明·买买提据称在巴基斯坦遭美军导弹击中受重伤。
description.en: Turkistan Islamic Party leader Abdul Haq al-Turkistani was reportedly seriously injured in a US missile strike in Pakistan.

description.zh-cn: 突厥斯坦伊斯兰党的分支机构在2011年叙利亚内战爆发后设在叙利亚，并派人参加叙利亚反政府武装。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Syrian Civil War in 2011, a branch of the Turkistan Islamic Party was established in Syria, and it sent members to join the Syrian anti-government forces.

description.zh-cn: 阿拉伯联合酋长国将“东伊运”列入恐怖主义组织名单。
description.en: The United Arab Emirates listed ETIM as a terrorist organization.

description.zh-cn: 英国内政部将突厥斯坦伊斯兰党列入《被禁恐怖组织名单》。
description.en: The UK Home Office added the Turkistan Islamic Party to the Proscribed Terrorist Organisations list.

description.zh-cn: 土耳其政府将“东伊运”列入恐怖主义名单。
description.en: The Turkish government listed ETIM as a terrorist organization.

description.zh-cn: 世界维吾尔代表大会主席热比娅于2007年否认新疆存在东突厥斯坦伊斯兰运动之组织。
description.en: In 2007, Rebiya Kadeer, then president of the World Uyghur Congress, denied the existence of the ETIM organization in Xinjiang.

description.zh-cn: 作为世俗派东突势力，世界维吾尔代表大会与伊斯兰化的“东伊运”在东突独立运动的话语权上存在竞争关系。
description.en: As a secular East Turkestan force, the World Uyghur Congress competes with the Islamist ETIM for narrative control within the East Turkestan independence movement.

description.zh-cn: 在阿萨德政权垮台后，突厥斯坦伊斯兰党发表声明，誓言要在解放沙姆地区后对中国发动圣战。
description.en: After the fall of the Assad regime, the Turkistan Islamic Party issued a statement vowing to wage jihad against China after liberating the Levant region.

relationships.source: 叙利亚突厥斯坦伊斯兰党

description.zh-cn: 叙利亚突厥斯坦伊斯兰党是突厥斯坦伊斯兰党在叙利亚的分支。
description.en: The Turkistan Islamic Party in Syria is the Syrian branch of the Turkistan Islamic Party.

relationships.target: 叙利亚突厥斯坦伊斯兰党

description.zh-cn: 2025年1月，叙利亚突厥斯坦伊斯兰党宣布解散，并入新成立的叙利亚国防部。
description.en: In January 2025, the Turkistan Islamic Party in Syria announced its dissolution and merger into the newly formed Syrian Ministry of Defense.

description.zh-cn: 突厥斯坦伊斯兰党曾是叙利亚内战期间的反政府武装联盟“征服军”的成员，直至2017年该联盟解散。
description.en: The Turkistan Islamic Party was a member of the Army of Conquest, an anti-government militant alliance during the Syrian Civil War, until the alliance dissolved in 2017.

description.zh-cn: 突厥斯坦伊斯兰党旨在在中国新疆地区建立独立国家，并策划实施了多起针对中国的恐怖袭击。
description.en: The Turkistan Islamic Party aims to establish an independent state in China's Xinjiang region and has planned and carried out multiple terrorist attacks against China.
